Name: Gold Rush
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of Lemon zest twist and lemon wedge.
REGAL SHAKE all ingredients (including grapefruit zest).
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: A Whiskey Sour made with honey syrup in place of sugar.
History: Recipe envisaged by T. J. Siegel one night in 2001 at Milk & Honey, New York City, USA, where it was first made by Sasha Petraske .
